item.description:
Please join us on Sunday, June 3rd at 1:00p.m. for a Puggie Meetup. We have a huge fenced in yard so we don't have to worry about letting the puggies off leash. I really hope you all can make it. All memebers are welcome!!

Feel free to contact me with any questions at all.

Alissa & Buster :)

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: Buster's Raindate Meetup
